verbs.description: scenarioize (third-person singular simple present scenarioizes, present participle scenarioizing, simple past and past participle scenarioized)

entries.meaning: (dated, transitive) To turn (a story, idea etc.) into a scenario for a play or film.
examples: It was this kindly old lady that lifted her part into such idealism that it saved from entire disregard the whole story as scenarioized by J. Grubb Alexander.
